page.title: 20Law And Order
page.content: The village has one policeman ,P.C.Lewis,who is based in the village Police Station. The policeman can patrol the village in his panda car,keeping and eye out for people to assist and to solve problems. One of his duties involves visiting the school to inform pupils on many things of importance,such as road saftey,and the importance of not accepting lifts from strangers. On occasions,however,P.C. Lewis has more demanding work to undertake,when crimes have been committed.Vandals often damage some of the village's amenties and the policeman has to investigate.Also there are an increasing number of house break-ins in the village.These are the policeman's greatest problems as they seem to be carried out by a well organised gang.
